subject: World Cup 2014 (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Spain, Germany and Italy moved to the doorstep of qualification for the 2014 World Cup with victories on Friday, while Cristiano Ronaldo helped Portugal atop its group.
snippet: Spain, Germany and Italy moved to the doorstep of qualification for the 2014 World Cup with victories on Friday, while Cristiano Ronaldo helped Portugal atop its group.
